BR_text.BRsummary: Language model example cannot be run
BR_text.BRdescription:
The language model example cannot be run without manually creating a data folder.
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/tree/master/example/gluon/word_language_model>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/tree/master/example/gluon/word_language_model</denchmark-link>
 
 Also, the document is inconsistent with the code.  For example, optional argument
 --data DATA        location of the data corpus
 does not appear in the code train.py
